projects.title: Algorithmic Trading with Python
projects.description: Section 1: Building An Equal-Weight BSE-200 Index Fund Theory & Concepts Importing our Constituents from IEX Cloud, Pulling Data For Our Constituents, Calculating Weights, Generating Our Output File. Section 2: Building A Quantitative Momentum Investing Strategy Theory & Concepts Pulling Data For Our Constituents, Calculating Weights, Generating Our Output File. This selects 20 stocks out of BSE_ 200 on the IEX cloud with the highest price momentum(HQM).

projects.title: Algo Strategy (Pine Script)
projects.description: This is based on cross overs of exponential moving averages, capable of processing market order long entry and exitAdded user-friendly feature to change averages type, averages period, and resolutions at the front end of the userAchieved 2904.57% net profit with 30.19% max drawdown when implemented on NIFTY in a bigger resolution
